title: Hero set to unveil 440cc motorcycle, likely to be based on Harley X440, on January 22. Here are details
description: Hero MotoCorp is gearing up to unveil a new 440cc motorcycle on January 22, signaling a shift to premium segments. The teaser hints at a departure from their traditional offerings, featuring a distinctive exhaust note and emphasizing the letter 'R.' Speculations suggest the bike might be based on the Harley Davidson X440 platform.
